longInfo:
Passport required.  
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued to
  nationals of the USA must be valid on arrival. 
- Warning: if departing from the USA (regardless of any
  destination passport exemptions), a valid passport and/or
  accepted departure document  is required by the
  US immigration authorities. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of Proof of Citizenship (such as Birth Certificate
  or a letter from the Attorney-General waiving Proof of
  Citizenship) issued to American Samoans, nationals of the
  USA provided arriving from the USA.
- Holders of Certificate of Identity with a recent photograph
  of holder, issued by a competent authority of a Government
  to a national of the USA if arriving from the USA. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- Minors travelling accompanied by one parent or by a person
  other than parent/legal guardian . 
Additional Information:
- All visitors must hold sufficient funds and documents for
  next destination
